title: RailWorks - The Great North Route v1.1 in RWP
description:
"Le Grand Nord" (The Great North) is a route by Zawal, a well-known French route builder.

LGN is a fictional 25-miles route set in Alaska (USA) and crossing the border into Canada. Running the total length takes about 40 to 50 minutes.
It is beautifully modeled and very realistic, perfectly capturing the atmosphere of Alaska's cold and remote regions. It offers possibilities for all kinds of scenarios, having passenger stations, logging camps, coal loaders, container loaders, etc.

The route comes with PierreG's custom-made assets, including planes, ships, canoes, snowmobiles and even bears ready to eat your lunch and/or you.

3 freeroam scenarios are provided, and a scenario pack by Belux Trains is a separate download, including 10 standard scenarios also included.

This is a repackaged version of the original route published on railsim-fr.com here: 
http://www.railsim-fr.com/forum/index.php?app=downloads&showfile=832.

You will need to have Donner Pass installed to play. 

This includes all rolling stock in the Alaska Livery and is now quick driveable as well as with all images. It has been tested working with everything in TS2016. Just install and have fun
